name: Fast Incident Response (FIR) Search
description: Searches Fast Incident Response (FIR) for artifacts contained within cybersecurity incidents.

options.name: FIR Server URL
options.description: The URL for your FIR instance to include the schema (i.e., https://) and port (e.g., https://fir:8000) as necessary

options.name: FIR User REST API Token
options.description: The REST API Token used to authenticate to your FIR instance.

options.name: Ignore Entities
options.description: Comma delimited list of indicators you do not want looked up.

options.name: Ignore Domain Regex
options.description: Domains that match the given regex will not be looked up.

options.name: Ignore IP Regex
options.description: IPs that match the given regex will not be looked up.
